text: Ara amara tomadera ya jibanopakarana diyechi ta theke tomara kharaca karo tomadera kono ekajanera kache mrtyu ese parara age'i, pache take balate haya -- ''amara prabhu! Kena tumi amake eka asannakala paryanta abakasa da'o ni, tahale to ami dana-khayarata karatama ebam ami satkarmidera antarbhukta hate paratama.â€™â€™
